definition: Containers designed to hold, protect, and transport items from one location to another.

positive_examples: She packed her clothes into the suitcase for the trip.
The shipping container was loaded onto the cargo ship.
I sealed the envelope and dropped it in the mailbox.
The package arrived damaged during shipping.
Workers unloaded boxes from the freight container.
Mail carriers collect letters from residential mailboxes daily.
negative_examples: She stored leftovers in a plastic food container.
The water bottle kept his drink cold all day.
He planted flowers in a ceramic pot.
The trash can was overflowing with garbage.
She organized her jewelry in a small wooden box.
The storage bin held winter clothes in the attic.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: StorageContainer, FoodContainer, LiquidContainer, WasteContainer
